meanings.sent1: She believed in the power of her mojo to bring her good luck.
meanings.sent2: The magician cast a spell using his mojo to make the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent3: The witch's mojo accidentally turned her cat purple instead of granting wishes.
meanings.sent4: His mojo was like a secret potion, unlocking hidden talents within him.
meanings.sent5: The mojo glowed brightly, illuminating the dark room with its mystical energy.

meanings.sent1: Her friendly smile and positive attitude gave her a strong mojo that attracted others.
meanings.sent2: The actor's charisma and mojo captivated the audience during his performance.
meanings.sent3: His mojo was so strong that even grumpy people couldn't resist smiling around him.
meanings.sent4: She had a magnetic mojo that drew people towards her like a powerful force.
meanings.sent5: His mojo was like a magnet, pulling everyone in with its irresistible charm.

meanings.definition: A quality that attracts people to you and makes you successful and full of energy.
meanings.sent1: His positive attitude and confidence gave him a winning mojo in everything he did.
meanings.sent2: The successful entrepreneur had a special mojo that inspired others to follow his lead.
meanings.sent3: Even on a rainy day, her mojo shone brightly, spreading happiness to everyone around her.
meanings.sent4: Her mojo was like a beacon, guiding her towards success and fulfillment.
meanings.sent5: The team's collective mojo fueled their energy and drive to achieve their goals.
